Body:
class Foo(NamedTuple):
    x: int
    y: str
foo = Foo(x=5, y='g')
self.assertEqual(named_tuple_to_dict(foo), {'x': 5, 'y': 'g'})
bar = {'x': 5, 'foo': foo, 'y': [(1, True), foo]}
self.assertEqual(named_tuple_to_dict(bar), {'x': 5, 'foo': {'x': 5, 'y':
    'g'}, 'y': [(1, True), {'x': 5, 'y': 'g'}]})
